Get some Air in, with Erin

Hey, hi! Welcome welcome! Pull up a cushion and let's connect. My name is Erin and I am an international wellness speaker and retreat leader sharing with the globe mindful tools to shift from the BULL to feeling completely WHOLE. Feel free to surf my site or click the button below to get my tips on how to build your own meditation practice.

For realz, tap this!

MIND

The marriage between psychology and our daily rituals dictate how we live our lives. Let's take a look at our own thoughts and feelings, how our mind operates, and enhance our mental efficiency through mindfulness practices.

BODY

How you feed and move your body is a form of self love. What is the narrative of the food on your plate? Weight loss, energy and clarity are just some of the positive side effects of understanding the psychology of eating.

SOUL

Nourish the soul by examining all the activities that brought you joy in the past! You deserve inner peace. Through yoga and meditation your soul will ignite and create your healthiest and most vibrant self.

Erin travels around the world leading workshops engrained in meditaiton and mindfulness based off the teachings she learned while living in The Mid East + South East Asia and her Psych Masters studies from Columbia University
